tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE currencies (
    currency_code VARCHAR(3) PRIMARY KEY,
    currency_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    exchange_rate DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE exchange_rates (
  exchange_rate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  currency_from_id INT NOT NULL,
  currency_to_id INT NOT NULL,
  rate DECIMAL(10, 4) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (currency_from_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (currency_to_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  total_amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
  currency_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (currency_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_rates (
    rate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    base_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    target_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    exchange_rate DECIMAL(10, 4) NOT NULL,
    rate_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE pricing (
    price_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    currency_id UUID NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    price_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_revenue DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    total_expenses DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    net_profit DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_rates (
    exchange_rate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_currency_id INT,
    target_currency_id INT,
    rate DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (source_currency_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (target_currency_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE prices (
    price_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    currency_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (currency_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE,
    currency_id INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (currency_id) REFERENCES currencies(currency_id)
);
